message.content:
cs.CL, cs.SD, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SI 

This paper is about improving automatic speech recognition (ASR) for a low-resource language, Somali. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language) which deals with natural language processing and speech recognition. The paper also involves machine learning techniques such as time-delay neural networks, which fall under the categories of cs.SD (Sound) and cs.LG (Learning). Additionally, the use of semi-supervised training is a common technique in the field of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and the paper discusses the use of decoder confidence as a threshold, which falls under the category of cs.SI (Social and Information Networks).
